title: High Quality of Utility Service Regulations
description: In 2024, Slovakia achieved a score of 91.74 in the quality of regulations on utility services, indicating strong regulatory frameworks in this sector.

title: Long Duration of Secondary Education
description: As of 2023, Slovakia offers a secondary education duration of 9 years, reflecting a commitment to extended educational opportunities.

title: Low Income Inequality
description: In 2022, Slovakia's Gini index was 24.1, one of the lowest globally, indicating a relatively equal distribution of income.

title: Significant Male Employment in Industry
description: In 2023, 49.02% of male employment in Slovakia was in the industrial sector, showcasing a robust industrial workforce.

title: Low Control of Corruption Variability
description: The standard error for control of corruption in Slovakia was 0.145 in 2023, suggesting stable perceptions of corruption control.

title: Minimal Net ODA Contribution to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Slovakia's net ODA to the least developed countries was only 0.0006% of GNI, indicating limited financial aid contributions.

title: Low Revenue from Customs and Import Duties
description: In 2022, customs and import duties accounted for just 0.0001% of Slovakia's tax revenue, reflecting minimal reliance on these taxes.

title: Limited Income Share for Highest 10%
description: The income share held by the highest 10% in Slovakia was 18.2% in 2022, indicating a more equitable income distribution compared to many countries.
